comments:

(This was observed on Mac OS X but not sure about other OS'es)

This is important for RC0.
Please fix soon!

(In reply to comment #1)
> This is important for RC0.
> Please fix soon!
> 

The reason for this "bug" is that the two batch plugins are not part of the release. I have contacted Mathias and Markus about it.
The two batch plugins (eu.geclipse.batch and eu.geclipse.batch.ui) are now part of the pre-release build
